page.title: 04STAINLAND VILLAGE
page.content: "I like Stainland because of the sports facilities." (Mark Mallinson). "I like living in Stainland because there are lots of things to do.I go to Brownies, I like going there because it takes up my time in a useful way." (Jane Mawer). "I like Stainland because there's lots to do and see." (Fiona Webster). There are two bus routes which run through Stainland, one goes up to Outlane before returning to Halifax, the other turns round in Stainland and returns to Halifax. This makes Halifax the easiest town to visit for Stainland villagers. In Stainland and its surrounding area many of the families can trace back their local connections for many generations.
